articles.title: The pandemic PC boom is over, but its legacy will live on
articles.content: The personal-computer industry reversed a yearslong slide in a sudden and explosive way during the first two years of COVID-19, but now growth is slowing just as PC makers are pushing out new machines geared toward the online activities that unexpectedly became everyday tasks
